data.name: DOITcoin
data.description:
What Is DOITCoin (DOIT)?

DOITCoin is a decentralized application platform designed to make shopping accessible from a mobile device. The network runs on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) with aim to be integrated into IOS and Android devices. 

DOITCoin will be the native coin for buying and selling goods through the application. There will be no 3rd party involved, it will be a peer-to-peer format to facilitate logistics within the parties involved. There will be no fee transaction when using DOITCoin to incentivized users to use DOITCoin. Other cryptocurrencies will be accepted with a percentage fee.

DOITCoin tools include: 

Wallet storage in the application 
Real time value price of DOITCoin 
Real time updates of goods listed/sold

TOKENOMICS 

DOITCoin did a fair launch on May 29, 2021 with an initial supply of 1,000,000,000,000,000 in which:
50% of that amount was burned (500,000,000,000,000,000)
43% as available for sale (430,000,000,000,000)
2.5% for Development (25,000,000,000,000)
2.5% for Marketing (25,000,000,000,000)
2% for charities, community and giveaways (20,000,000,000,000)

DOITCoin is a deflationary token in which there is a 10% tax per transaction in which 5% of tokens go back to holders, 3% of the tokens are burn, 2% of tokens go into liquidity. Therefore, a manual of 3% will be conducted every month. 


Where can I buy DOITCoin?

DOITCoin is available on PancakeSwap via Trustwallet or Metamask. 

New to cryptocurrency? Guide on how to use and buy on PancakeSwap

https://academy.binance.com/en/articles/a-guide-to-pancakeswap





What makes DOITCoin Unique?

DOITCoin aims to connect people to buy and sell goods entirely through a blockchain system without the use of a 3rd party who seeks commission or a percentage. DOITCoin knows the importance of reaching remote areas where peers can connect to do a transaction. It appeals to the small merchants who want to reach their local communities in large and remote areas.  



Who are the founders of DOITCoin?


Our founder Miguel has dedicated a large part of his professional life to the field of business and marketing. He is a goal-oriented person, with the philosophy that with great effort and dedication objectives can be achieved. He has successfully managed his own businesses in the area of   technology and sales. He wants to dedicate all his time and energy to successfully undertake and bring the cryptocurrency business to an optimal level. 

 He met up with a graphic designer, Nicolas Martins, and they talked about his idea of DOITCoin and after 6 months the DOITCoin became and a reality and now Miguel manages a team of 9 people.
